contacts.name: Mr. Xiyan
contacts.signature: Without an understanding ear, words are merely expended breath.

130140000.text: {F#Ms.}{M#Mr.} {NICKNAME}, I recently received a pet — a fun creature — from an avid listener. I thought you might be interested.

130140001.text: I can't bring it with me when I'm telling stories, so I've left it at Spare Time Book Shop, which is my store.

130140002.text: If you're interested, you can drop by Spare Time Book Shop and take a look. I believe you'll like it!

130140003.text: A pet? I adore small animals. Let me check it out now.

130140004.text: Heheh, I'm sure you've never seen the animal before. It's very fascinating.

130140005.text: I'm not really keen on it... As a Trailblazer, I'm too busy to check out a pet.

130140006.text: Don't jump to conclusions so soon! I'm sure you've never seen the animal before. It's very fascinating.

130140007.text: Go ahead and take a look when you change your mind.
